name: Baomintu2122 Leave In Conditioning Styler
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Leave-In Conditioner
about: What it is:A thick, creamy, and rich daily leave-in conditioner to prep, rehydrate, and soften kinky, curly, and wavy hair textures..Hair Type:Medium and Thick.Hair Texture:Curly and Coily.Hair Concerns:.Key Benefits:.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances. This product is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This product is exceptionally moisturizing and recommended for hydrating dry, parched hair on a daily basis or prepping before styling with gel or cream. It is formulated with natural omega fatty acids to complement hair growth and growth retention when used as part of a healthy hair regimen.
ingredients: -Lavender Oil: Contains antimicrobial properties..-Rosemary Leaf Oil: Improves circulation..-Nettle Extract: Helps to make hair shinier and healthier...Water (Aqua), Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glycerin, Opuntia Ficus Indica (Prickly Pear) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (Fractionated Coconut Oil), Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Lavandula Spica (Lavender) Oil, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Oil, Phthalates Free Fragrance, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Silk Amino Acids, Vanilla Tahitensis (Vanilla) Fruit Oil.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply the Baomint Leave In Conditioning Styler on wet hair after rinsing out the Baomint Moisturizing Deep Conditioning Treatment (sold separately)..-Rake the product through with your fingers until it dissolves..-Depending on your desired look, follow with our Baomint Moisturizing Curl Defining Cream (sold separately) or Baomint Moisturizing Curl Defining Gel (sold separately)..-Can also be used daily for an added moisture boost.   .-Pro tip: For wavy and curly textures, this product may be used alone for your wash and go, or you can also use it to re-twist your twist-out.

reviews.review_title: The smell gave me a headache
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer for curly hair.  Unfortunately the smell is overwhelming.   Gave me a headache and bothered my husband too.   Why do companies do this?!   Create a great product and then ruin it with heavy fragrance.  It limits the curlies that can wear this.  Very unfortunate

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's so good! I have thigh length wavy hair that's prone to knotting, and this conditioner makes the whole detangling process so much easier. Here's an old photo of my hair from when I started using it last year. Results are practically instantaneous and the bottle lasts pretty long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Black girl with type 4 hair. Used as leave in with TGIN mousse for flexi rod set and it was wonderful. Also used as leave in for wash and go with big poppa gel and it was wonderful. Best leave in I have ever used and no flaking with any products I have used

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For me, this is good but nothing special. I found that my hair has a weird texture to it if I leave it in, so I use it as a wash out conditioner. It works much better for me that way, but my hair also may be the wrong type for this product. It isn't super thick or curly, which I think is maybe the hair type this conditioner is more geared toward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My hair feels moisturized but lacks the definition Iu2019d get from an EcoStyler or the Doux u201cBig Poppau201du2026.Iu2019d be willing to try alternative techniques with this product to get the results I want but the smell is overpoweringud83eudd2e

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My thick, type 4, and low porosity hair had a lot of moisture and definition all over (even parts that I didnu2019t think had a curl pattern). Even though the leave-in and gel in this line are lightweight and NOT greasy, my hair was weighed down in a nice way. Tips: Use a clarifying shampoo to make sure the hair doesnu2019t have any build up. Also, spray plenty of water on the hair before applying the leave-in and before the gel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It's a very thick conditioner that I use as a leave-in and it works wonderfully at keeping the frizz at bay.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Adwoa Beauty's MelonBerry Hair Milk Leave-In Conditioner is a total haircare gem! It's lightweight, nourishing, and smells incredible. My curls felt super hydrated and looked so bouncy after using it. Definitely a must-have for anyone looking to revive and moisturize their hair. Complimentary from adwoabeauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all the packaging is super cute looking & thereu2019s a lot of product in here. Smells really good in my hair and doesnu2019t weight down my hair - I have fine thin hair. This was gifted by Adwoa for review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this melonberry hair milk leave-In conditioner complimentary from brand to test and review. I am a fan of this leave-in. It works great on my thin/fine hair, as well as my 2 year old daughter's hair. With no oily feeling left behind, and a delicious fruity scent. I can't help but recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this leave in conditioner is gifted to me. It makes my hair very very soft and nice and smells amazing. its very very easy to use and lasts till you wash your hair. may work on all kind of hair with the textures

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Sephora for consideration but all opinions are my own. The baomint leave in conditioning styler is really a lot better than a detangler because it's definitely richer & actually feels stronger!

I received this complimentary from Adowa in exchange for my honest opinion, reviews are my own! This leave in styling conditioner works great! I noticed my hair is less frizzy and more moisturized, I would highly recommend this!

reviews.review_title: Can't Miss This Step When Washing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This leave in smells so good. I love that a pump or two goes a long way. This is always a must in my hair before styling because I noticed it helps keep my hair hydrated and soft for longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is my new must-have! It's strengthened my skin barrier, leaving it visibly healthier and more youthful. I can't get enough of the hydration and protection it provides. Perfect for my curly hair too! complimentary from adwoabeauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've got long, fine hair that tends to get dry at the ends and tangle easily. If I skip conditioner in my hair wash routine, my hair starts falling out more. So, it's a must for me to use hair oil or a leave-in treatment after washing. The melonberry leave-in conditioner is wonderful u2013 it smells amazing, doesn't make my hair heavy, and keeps them hydrated. The spray nozzle also makes it super convenient to apply.    gifted by Adwoa beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love   this  leave in. I have trouble  finding a product that defines  my waves the way I like them and at the  same time leaves them  shiny and hydrated without looking wet. I love.  the smell is mild and the hydration aspect lasts for a long time. Complimentary from adwoabeauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had previously tried the adwoa curl cream (in the tub) and it was too heavy for my loose curls, but this conditioning styler is just right. It still provides moisture and definition but without the heaviness, and I find it works really well for air drying. I can even use it as a one-and-done on days I don't want to put much effort in, which is always appreciated!  I'm one of those who loves the minty and herbal smell, I find it very refreshing. However, I do appreciate that the smell is polarizing, so it's probably a good idea to smell a tester in-store first to see if you like it. No matter how good a hair product is, if I can't stand the smell, I won't use it.   Since there's so much product and a little goes a long way, I think the bottle will last me a really long time. I do like to switch up my hair products on wash days depending on my hair's mood, the weather, and the styles I'm going for, but I will definitely keep this in my hair product rotation, it's a good one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't write a review right away because I wanted to use the product for a while first. I have been using this for over a month on my 3C - 4A high to medium porosity hair and I LOVE it. It provides a lot of slip and it seems to hold the moisture in my hair for multiple days after applying it to clean damp hair. The best description I can give is that my hair feels plump and juicy before and after it's dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do not enjoy the smell that much but enjoys the result. I am happy the smell doesnu2019t last that long on me! It is a little thicker than what I was expecting but itu2019s still easy to work with. Iu2019ve tried a few products already and this one is my favourite to enhance my natural waves!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great leave-in conditioner, I just really hate the smell of it. It seems too weird, I canu2019t even describe it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product it doesn't go on heavy I like how it makes my scalp feel

reviews.review_title: sure it works for others but just not for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: not for me. in the bottle is smells nice, and has good ingredients. on my hair I feel like it smells funky, and kind of made my scalp itch. for reference, I have thin, curly/wavy, and frizzy hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this anytime my hair is dry, right after washing right before blow drying. Perfect leave in conditioner. Starts off a little white but will melt eventually. When I use It in a protective style protect it does and keep hair clean and soft.

reviews.review_title: A must-have for dry and chemically processed hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was desperately looking for a product that was hydrating and clean and let me tell you, this product feels amazing! Make sure you use only a little bit because itu2019s super thick. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just tried this for the first time and was so shocked at how thick and juicy this leave-in is!! I mean it's as thick as the Adwoa deep conditioner. I worked this in small sections of my hair in small amounts, and was amazed at how moisturizing a little bit of this product was. This leave-in melts in immediately and gave my 4c curls a bit of weight and shine, feeling sooooooo soft, and smelling soooo fresh. Absolutely worth every penny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely awful, overwhelming scent. It actually made me slightly sick. Returned

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the shampoo and Deep conditioning treatment to start off.  I love this product line so much I purchased the entire set.  I do have a few sensitivities to ingredients, so I am careful not to overuse!

reviews.review_title: Must had to your hair routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Buy it ! Works great on all hair type and super hydrating. Been using it for a while and it help me maintain my length.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I did not enjoy this product at all, it makes my hair look like I havenu2019t washed it, super greasy I wouldnu2019t buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this product moisturized my hair but idk for some reason it just didn't wow me , i definitely could do  without it but i'd say give it a try for sure , you may love it .. oh & as i've said in my other reviews i HATE the smell..adowa please change this, it is not pleasant at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice slip but the scent is strong. Could cause a headache if youu2019re sensitive to fragrance.

reviews.review_title: scent is meh but my hair feels amazing!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: pleasantly surprised by this product! my curl pattern is somewhere around 2c and this stuff does WONDERS for my curls, they're so defined and feel perfectly moisturized but not heavy or greasy at all.  the scent is really the only thing i don't love about this product, it's not bad at all but it's very sweet smelling and i can understand why some people really didn't like it. i can kinda see where people are coming from when they describe it as a bubblegum sort of scent, but i don't think that's entirely accurate. i knew it wasn't going to smell like mint after reading the product description and reviews so it's not like that caught me off guard or anything, but i do really wish it had a minty smell considering the fact that it has mint in the name, and i wouldn't be surprised if someone bought this thinking that's what it was going to smell like.  overall i really do like this product and i'll probably buy it again when i run out (^:

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: Wasnu2019t able to try the product because after 1 month of  purchasing, the whole bottle was dried up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing. It provided such great moisture and ability to detangle. I have 3c/4a hair. My hair absorbed this product so well, I was honestly shocked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't provide any moisture or tame any frizz, just left my hair looking dull, feeling dry/sticky, and smelling like bubblegum toothpaste. Genuinely baffled by all of the (overwhelmingly) positive reviews.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, this is my favorite Adwoa Beauty product!  This product penetrates my hair like NOTHING ELSE!  There aren't enough words to do it justice. Before the travel/trial sets were as readily available as now, I would always encourage my curlfriends to try this one first if they were on the fence.  (& then I'd say, if you're planning to do a wash and go, better grab that gel too!)
I love the smell and texture of this product. Very hydrating!

reviews.review_title: The best product for kinky hair!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I use it in my natural hair and my daughteru2019s natural hair.  My hair is very kinky and this works wonders for me, especially since I blow dry my hair.  Leaves it feeling soft, manageable and protected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I went into Sephora looking for a product that would hold and moisturize my curls at the same time. I was recommended to this product & I love that itu2019s a Black owned brand.  My curls are a mix between 3B & 3C. I apply a little amount as recommended. Literally when my hair is damp, I finger comb through my hair with this product and when my curls dry, itu2019s so beautiful.  I love how this product leaves my hair looking. Itu2019s not too heavy, it doesnu2019t make it feel like there is heavy residue on my curls. It overall looks healthier.   I definitely recommend this product if this is something by youu2019re considering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Adwoa haircare! My frizzy curly gray hair does great with this leave in conditioner. If only Sephora kept all the Adwoa products in stock.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Super heavy & leaves visible dull grease appearance on hair.  For reference I have fine hair but a lottttt of it & itu2019s long, & iu2019ve tried this product, the adwoa beauty boamint leave in styler + oil, & their blue tansy oil product AND the blue tansy leave in styler & they all left my hair visibly weighed down & extremely greasy in appearance.  When I tried this one I said, u201cokay, iu2019m going to literally only use ONE dropu201d & applied to SOLELY the ends of my hair with extreme light strokes & you could immediately tell upon application it was going to never dry up or soak in so I literally stopped after barely stroking through the last inch of my hairs endsu2026   These products are all terrible - iu2019ve given them all a try & none of them soak in & they visibly leave your hair heavy & weighed down + dull.  I cannot understand at all how these are likedu2026 They smell fantastic but thatu2019s about it. Absolutely horrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this product but I despise the smell of it. I am not picky with scents and this one I can hardly tolerate it
Adwoa is and will forever be my G.O.A.T. Leave in conditioner. If you want a product that pairs well  with the curl cream and can be used solo then this is the product for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Now, if you want your life changedu2026 get this product. Got the sample at first, then came back for more! Great for lasting hydration. Wish I found this brand earlier in the winter for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have 4C hair and it can be very dry, but using this as a leave in and a styler it works perfect for keeping my hair super soft. I use it for re twisting my hair a few time a week. Love mixing it with the adwoa oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: -this smells like mint. so smells good and very refreshing mint on the scalp.  -makes hair very soft and is not heavy  -you only use a small amount so this will last a long while making the price worth it. especially if you do klarna.  -love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. It makes my curls look the best. Smells great. Little goes a long way. The packaging is not the best. It is a thick formula so would prefer a jar.

reviews.review_title: GET IT U WONT REGRET IT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Prevents frizziness, smells bomb  I have thick hair and this does the trick for maintaining management post shower

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've got a mixed 2A/3A curl pattern with fine, protein-thirsty hair; I bought this in conjunction with their Blue Tansy conditioner, and after a first use, I've instantly fallen in love. My curls are bouncy, which I expected, but I wasn't prepared for it to make my hair SO SOFT. It's ridiculous! I got away with using only one pump for my whole head (mid-back length) and the smell is just divine, minty with a subtle, almost spicy undertone (it lingers awhile.) I've been exploring curly girl options for over a year now and this brand is my new standard.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been life changing for my hair. I use it at the end of wash day or during braid outs and it always leaves my hair with a nice, healthy sheen and curl definition. Not to mention it smells really nice. The product also lasts a long time, even with regular use. Will definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is sooo awesome it leaves my hair VERY moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this so much!! One of the products that has really helped me figure out my curly hair finally. Also smells amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Holy GRAIL!!!!!  Please NEVER stop selling this Sephora!  -signed kinky girls around the world!
By far my favorite leave in EVER! Pricey? Yes, but worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! I have been using it for a few years now, and no leave in seals in my hairu2019s moisture like this one. My hair is soft and moisturized for days without a refresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Adwoa Beauty ever since they originated years ago and I refuse to get hair products from anyone else! This leave in nourishes my curls and leaves them hydrated to the max. Please check out their shampoo as well, it does not disappoint!

reviews.review_title: Great leave in and smells even better!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best leave in ever! Itu2019s very lightweight and leaves no residue. Very moisturizing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best leave in conditioner! Always leaves my hair moisturized and works well as a styler too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The best leave in period  I have 3 different 3C 4A hair and it works for all patterns and gives good hydration love this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells horrible! I was upsold by the sales associate and assured me this product was perfect leave in and curl creme. But I just couldnu2019t get passed the smell and left my hair sticky and crunchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell. It only smells like cherry cough syrup when I sniff it from the bottle. Once it's in my hair, the smell changes to a nice minty smell. I love the clean ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the small size just to see if this product would work on my naturally very dry, course, wavy and hi-lighted with bleach, Caucasian hair. I tried a very small amount on dry hair and I must sayu2026. I love it! My dry hair just drinks it up, making it much more silky and manageable. The fragrance doesnu2019t bother meu2026 just smells very clean and fresh. If youu2019re on the fence about it, give it try! Your dry, frizzy hair will thank you for it!

reviews.review_title: Leave in and deep conditioner purchase
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this leave in with the deep conditioner. Again, it just wasn't as moisturizing as I expected. I will finish the container and re-review. I have 4b/4c hair that is high porosity.

reviews.review_title: Love this with the hair cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this with the gel and the hair cream. My hair felt so soft after each use, I didn't like the gel with the leave in it causes flakes if your hair is not wet enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is refreshing. The consistency was not too heavy. I was not wowed, but do believe it works well. It is worth a try, and the price point is not too bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the leave in, curl cream, and gel. I wasnu2019t even able to use these they smelled so bad to me. The smell is like medicinal + cherry. Physically made my stomach ill. Unfortunate as I was really looking forward to using these :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really really blown away by this product. I have 4c/4b Low porosity hair. It's taken me about 2 years to finally come across this product to bring my curls back. I used the deep conditioner and it worked so well I bought the whole line. My edges broke off and they are coming back WITH THIER CURLS, since I've been using this product. I truly truly recommend it to anyone who has dry or brittle hair or split ends. I also really like the smell, it's calming. It's an authentic mint smell. I pray they never stop selling this or change the formula as this whole line is a staple in my routine. I was able to braid my hair after washing it while wet!! I've not been able to do that since I relaxed my hair every 6 months years ago. This w/ the deep conditioner completely detangled my hair and my hair even had a sheen to it again.  I never do reviews, especially long ones, but the other reviews helped me, so hopefully this helps someone too!!

reviews.review_title: Great line of products for curly hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used the leave-in, curl gel, and hair oil combination and I really like it. I wasnu2019t a fan of the smell at first but Iu2019ve gotten used to it and I really like it now. I like how moisturizing these are and I only need a VERY small amount on my high porosity, coarse, medium density, 3b/3c coils/curls. I like how light the products are and how soft it makes my hair (without the stickiness). I also love how the gel provides really strong bouncy hold for several days with about a teaspoon of product. I usually need to use a lot more gel to get the hold I want (I would typically use about 2tablespoons of breogio curl charisma). I would definitely purchase this product again. I wouldu2019ve given it a 5 if it had a little more slip and milder smell. I will say that the first time I used these products, I used too much because Iu2019m used to using more with others products. It felt sticky, heavy, and the smell was a little too potent for me. Once I reduced the amount of product though during my next few styles, I really liked it and the smell was a lot lighter, fresher, and pleasant to me. I would advise experimenting with the amount you use if you had a similar experience before throwing it out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I only need a small amount of this leave in and it makes a noticeable difference in defining my curls. I was worried about the smell after reading other reviews but I like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given a bottle of this from my niece. I definitely will be repurchasing. The shampoo, deep conditioner and this leave in are awesome! My hair feels so soft afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the 3rd month of using this product, the gel, and hair oil. I absolutely love these products! I have 3c (and in some parts of my hair 3 a &b) hair type. I struggled with split ends, dry brittle hair. After using this product my hair retained moisture, had less split ends, and lasted til the next wash day. These are now staple products of mine! The pic below is day 3 hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is based on my first time use!!! i was honestly skeptical about using this on my long, curly hair that tends to dry out and get frizzy quick. i was looking for a light leave-in that would moisturize and soften, and this is truly amazing. and i LOVE the smell!! it is strong at first but it fades into this subtle, beautiful scent and i'm obsessed. i just say give it a shot if you're looking for the same things for your hair, i will leave another review after a few more days of use but what i did this morning was dry my hair with a microfiber towel out of the shower, and then used argon oil as my detangler, and then put two pumps of this all throughout my hair and air dried. bam! its perfect! my hair has never felt so soft and relaxed. just give it a try!

reviews.review_title: great for fine and brittle hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this product. I have fine but very dry and brittle hair thats so frizzy, itu2019s nearly impossible to manage (probably due to taking accutane which ruined my hair). I use this product on damp hair and sometimes on dry hair as well and it makes my hair look smooth, shiny, and feel healthy. Which is sooo rare for me. Too much will make my hair look a bit oily so I just use a little bit and itu2019s perfect. I follow up with a light oil and it really is an awesome combination. I recommend this even for fine hair! Also Iu2019m happy that the ingredients are so clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have 2B hair - dry & frizzy, gets tangled easily. I can't even use a full pump without weighing down my hair and looking greasy.. But it's not enough to brush out the tangles. Save your money. Wish I could return!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product, but it doesn't like me.  I have been using since September 2020 and bought most of the line.  My low porosity hair, 4C hair responds well to it.  It does soften and detangles my hair well.   I first started using this with other shampoos and conditions, but styled with this and the curl cream.  I use for twists and wash-n-goes with much success.  Sometimes I use the oil and sometimes I don't.  What I have learned recently is that this product does cause me itching.  It took me a while to narrow the problem down to this product. I will continue to use it until I finish off the bottle, I have about .25 left.  However, I will not be repurchasing.  I am learning with my scalp that less is more and to avoid leave ins, given that the itchy scalp tends to happen with leave ins.  I have extremely sensitive skin, so having a product cause itching is not that unheard of for me.  I have yet to have found a leave in that does not cause my scalp to itch.  My recommendation is to try this product.  If you don't have the itchy scalp problem, then you most likely will enjoy it.  I think it has the right about of thickness and is not too greasy for us low porosity folks.    In terms of the smell, it really doesn't bother me and I am pretty sensitive to smells.  The smell is minty, but does disappear after a while.  The smell can seem overwhelming the first time you use the product, so give it several weeks before returning based on smell.  If I have one complaint, it's the size of the bottles.  I would love it if there were a small and large bottle of this.  A small bottle would make life easier while traveling and give customers a chance to try the product for a few months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is very thick so you only need a very small amount. My biggest Hangup is the smell, I do not like it and wonu2019t be using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this, nothing curls my hair as well as this does, and I truly don't mind the smell at all.  One downside is this has lavender which is a common thing people are allergic too. I really wish companies would stop putting lavender in things.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Reading other peoples reviews, I thought u201cmint is a good smell, why donu2019t they like it?u201d. But it does smell weird. Itu2019s not a clean mint smell, itu2019s kind of sickly sweet and minty? I made my bf smell my hair and he is not a fan either. However it does seem to work... used it a couple times and my hair does feel moisturizer. I will warn though that you need to do a really good job of rinsing it out as there can be some residue. I use it in combination with my scalp scrubber and my head seems pretty happy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to support this brand but the smell of this conditioner is very strong. To me it smells like toothpaste and floor cleaner, so try in store first. Going to return but it might work for others though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: (NOTE: Only 3 stars bc it couldn't heal damage caused by Briogeo Curl Charisma, otherwise would be 4) Smells & feels amazing! However, it's not moisturizing enough for my fine, thin, soft ringlet curls. Try it, it may fit your needs

reviews.review_title: sadly itu2019s a no for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair
reviews.review_text: I hate to give this a one star but itu2019s by far my least favorite leave in I have tried. I can. Not. Stand. The. Smell. Maybe itu2019s just me but I cant place why I hate the smell so much. It also does not provide enough slip in my hair to brush easily. For reference I have 2b 2c fine hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let's get one thing clear. This leave-in IS THAT GIRL. This really takes me wash n go's to the next level as far as softening and moisture goes. But also I notice that when I use it, I get more curl elongation! My hair drinks it UP. It also smells really nice :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the holy grail of leave in conditioner. I bought this a month ago and havenu2019t even used a quarter of the bottle. Iu2019m one of the naturals that needs to use an entire hand full of product to achieve moisture and definition. This product is a testament to only need a u201cquarter sized portionu201d to achieve the look tour going for. Highly recommend for other THICK 4c coily gals.

reviews.review_title: Great product but the smell is strong
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I finally found a product that works for my 4c hair buuuut it smells like pool water for the first day. The smell fades after a while but it is STRONG when you first apply it, even in small doses. I hope they can do something about the scent because everything else about this product is AMAZING. This leave in conditioning styler is the moisture my hair needs leaving it quite soft without a CAST. What?! How?! Where they do that? Adwoa Beauty DOES THAT! I just hope they can come out with another version that is scent-free or a version that has a light scent. I love mint but this smelled more like chlorine than a tic tac..
Love this product! Leaves my hair soft and moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this leave in!  I have fine hair that dries out easily. I was a little nervous when I first pumped out the product because it is thick. However, I applied to wet hair out of the shower then styled with the gel...loveeee!  Moisture and definition without weighing down my hair. This is the first product Iu2019ve tried that has kept my hair moisturized beyond day 1. Love this!

reviews.review_title: Thick consistency, but goes on lightweight!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product daily since I received it, and, although it is thick, it goes on weightlessly, and provides a good level of daily moisture to my dry, natural hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine-medium type 3 curls, and I loved this product on my hair. I added one pump to each section (I split my hair in half) and even that was a bit too much. It is a rich product, so if you have finer hair, use sparingly. I would use this one it's own on days where I wanna be lazy & just use one product. Also, I got more volume on day 2!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin, fine, 2A-3A curls that are frizzy and never want to clump nicely together. This product, although thick, was not too heavy for my visibly thinning and fine hair. I used 1 pump and raked it through my hair in the shower then scrunched. It hydrated my hair, was not too heavy even though I also applied it to my roots, and came out of the packaging nicely. The reason why I took a star off was the overpowering smell. I do not usually have any issues with fragrance and no sensitivities to scent but the fragrance on this product is overkill. It smells like the cheap sugary fruit punch you have as a child. Lovely product but the scent not so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing!! I have not had this level of definition and spirals from any other leave in product! So happy with my purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing leave in for 3c hair. It leaves my hair frizz free with excellent curl definition.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product leaves my hair richly moisturized and has helped my hair to grow so healthy and long. I absolutely love it and recommend it to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible smell. I don't know if it worked because I had to wash it out it smelled so bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best leave-in I've ever used! it works amazingly well on wet or dry hair and I can always depend on it to keep my hair moisturized and soft for days on end.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The leave-in is GREAT! Does exactly what it says itu2019s going to do. Works great as a styler and adds lasting moisture! I have used this on a  blow out and lost nothing, the moisture prevails! Itu2019s fairly light and spreads easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this after I shower when my hair is damp. Itu2019s heavy but doesnu2019t weigh my hair down and make it greasy. I definitely recommend for most hair types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am 55 years old and have never written a review in my life, but I am so thrilled with this product that this is my first.  I am white with half gray, fairly thick, coarse, somewhat wavy hair.  I have never found a product that worked well, I have been using coconut oil, which was recommended by a black friend.  I so appreciate the reviews from the white customers, just because I was encouraged to try this product.  Score!  I live in Mexico and am in the sun every day and the ocean often.  This product is amazing.  It untangles, adds softness and shine without making my hair heavy or greasy.  I use it as directed but also in my own way.  I use a small squirt in the morning on dry hair and it is wonderful.  ALSO, I use two full squirts before I go into the ocean, then braid my hair.  The sun is intense enough to create a heavy conditioning effect, and this product seems to be protecting my hair from the saltwater.  My hair feels (and looks) so much healthier after just a few uses!  Equally important to me are the facts that this is a black owned brand and it is a clean product.  I am going to recommend this product to everyone who mentions my hair; I just got a compliment today.  Thank you, Adwoa, for this awesome product, and thank you, Sephora, for identifying black owned brands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bet Iu2019m not the only one dedicating a little time in 2020-2021 to exploring my wavy/curly hair. Iu2019m seeing with help from this product that just by finger combing and fluffing/sprunching my 2C-3A borderline hair I can see better volume in a pretty shape without much frizz. I picked up Briogeo for the first time in the same order too, and while that stuff is awesome Iu2019m preferring the Baomint right now. Maybe itu2019s just since itu2019s winter, but it seems to be moisturizing better while giving some nice hold thatu2019s manageable. Bodacious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Product smells nice, and works pretty well. For the price and the packaging (the tube connecting the spout and the product broke as soon as I got the bottle), I wonu2019t be buying again. It didnu2019t really do much for my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff made my hair smell so bad.  I had to air my pillow for 5 days before I could use it again. I cannot use it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you were only going to choose one product from this line, it should be this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This leave in is the best! It is thick and creamy to coat my hair without weighing it down or leaving it greasy. I noticed an immediate difference after using this project. My curls were soft and manageable for days . A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair
reviews.review_text: Im so beyond impressed with this product. For years I've struggled to brush/comb my hair due to constant tangles of my curls. This was the first product I've ever tried that got the tangles out within 3 minutes. Only reason I gave it 4/5 stars was because the essential oils in the product are a little too much smell-wise for me and may take some getting used to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 1a hair that was extremely dry from having highlights that were messed up and then needing a color correction. A little went a long way Iu2019ll have this stuff forever it added volume and completely transformed my shoulder length hair. That said I only gave 4 stars because if you have anything at 3c or above I would think you would need to use a lot of product for the same outcome and it would run out fast. so for me it was worth the 24 bucks, but it would be to little product for someone with above 3c hair and not worth 24 dollars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m always on the look for any help with my coarse frizzy hair. Gave this a try and itu2019s great leave in. I stopped using my silicone based oils and leave ins. Leaves hair soft and in  Florida weather doest pouf as usual. Smell doesnu2019t bother me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine, low-porosity, protein-sensitive 4c hair, I did a twist out with the product (LCO method) but it left my hair dry the next day. It works well on my curly clip-ins that are a looser texture. I wonu2019t repurchase for myself. The only thing I like is the design of the bottle and the scent disappears if you mix the product with oils.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!! The product comes out very thick, but doesn't leave strands feeling greasy or weighed down, a must have. Great product with great ingredients

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Would've given a 5 stars but the smell is verrrrrrrry strong. I think it goes way once dry but maybe I just get use to it after some hours. Before this I used deva curl decadence conditioner and ouidad humidity control gel. With just this one product I get muchhhhhhh better results, it detangles wonderfully and once its done I have  bouncy shiny defined curls.  once its soaking wet I separate my hair into five sections and use a  little less than a pump for each section. I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love how lustrous my hair looks after using this product. I purchased to use as part of my hair routine on wash days. Honestly I can actually use this alone and my hair looks awesome! Iu2019ve tried many leave in conditioners that I felt were great. I wanted to try something new and this has exceeded my expectations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Drying. They changed the original formula. I used to use the one that I ordered directly from Adwoa Beauty that was thick, creamy, defining and had an off-white yellow color. It was a true u201cstyleru201d and leave-in. My coils would clump together with that one.  This new formula is thinner, like water, which should make it better for penetrating low porosity hair, but it lacks moisture and needs half the bottle to saturate wet hair. I am not sure what the goal was with this new formula, but it leaves my hair sounding crispy like hay, no moisture, no softness, no definition. Perhaps there is too much glycerin or oil, but the ingredients donu2019t seem compatible with hydration and softness. I just wasted a wash day on this entire product line and need to re-do my hair. Itu2019s that bad. I will be returning this mess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to make sure I wrote a review on an amazing product. I am finally satisfied with a leave in conditioner! The packaging is perfect. The product works amazing for my 4 type hair. Itu2019s a bit costly for a leave in but the size is bigger than the 13 dollar bottle I use by Camille rose. So itu2019s almost double the amount for Adwoa. The smell is lovely. u2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It right for my Sticky, thick, difficult to apply. Forget about it. Save your money. If someone knows of a good leave-in for fine, wavy hair, let me know.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed! After a lifetime of straightening my hair I decided to embrace my natural curls/waves. Iu2019m trying out the curly girl method and put in about a quarter size drop of this leave-in onto soaking wet hair. My hair feels bouncy, healthy, and moisturized! I was a little worried at first bc I thought itu2019d be too heavy for my hair but itu2019s perfect! Never had such beautiful defined curls as I do with this. For reference, Iu2019m white and have fine, highly porous hair ranging somewhere between 2B and 3A

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have 3a&b curls and have used DevaCurl for almost ten years. I live in an region with very humid summers and I also swim, and DevaCurl always left me still a little dry and in need of regular olapelx treatments. Iu2019ve tried some curl products for POC but they almost always ended up being too heavy for my hair (I am white). I decided to take a chance on this new brand after reading the reviews and honestly cannot believe how good the results have been! My curls look so healthy and way more defined. With Deva Curl, Iu2019d always have to re-wet my hair and more often than not just fully rinse and just restyle/add products, which really adds up. But using this line Iu2019ve been able to sleep on my hair and not have to do anything the next day, which is amazing.   When I do wash, Iu2019m using a clarifying shampoo (because of the swimming) and currently Iu2019m using what I have left of DevaCurl decadence. Iu2019ve been pairing the Adwoa leave in with the Adwoa curl creme then finishing with the DevaCurl gel I have. But once my Deva products have run out, I am making the full switch! I always needed so much Deva product that when I traveled it was always easier to just get a blow out rather than fill a small suitcase full of product. But now I wonu2019t have to worry about that and can actually just enjoy my curls anywhere :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have long, highlighted, extra fine 2b/2c hair and this is the best leave in styler I've ever tried. A tiny bit goes such a long way and leaves my hair so super soft and bouncy, fluffy but still defined. I hadn't seen any reviews from people of my ethnicity (white), and so I was a little worried that it wouldn't work for me, but it's just amazing. I use a single pump of this along with a couple dabs of the curl cream for my whole head and I'm ordering the gel to try next because I'm in love with what I've tried. Even better that I can support a WOC owned small business while achieving amazing results. Holy grail for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great leave in made my curls pop!! Will repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, this whole line has saved my hair!!!!! I am 4c, high porosity, fine hair, low to medium density, the kind you donu2019t see on you tube, after years, really decades of neglect I felt there was no hope for my hair and I would always wear weave, no exaggerating my hair was horrible, so the pandemic came and I had to rely on doing my hair and I decided that life is short and I should be grateful for the hair God gave me, I stumbled on this from a you tube video and although expensive I was determined to try it and it was the best decision I ever made. My hair stop shedding so much, my coils are more defined, and my hair is growing. I went from people asking me u201cwhatu2019s wrong with my hairu201d to compliments. Get the whole line it feels like you just came out of the salon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This is the best leaves in conditioner and styler in  1.  I love the light hold it has on my curls.

reviews.review_title: Best hair products I have used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have so many good things to say about this line.  I have 4a/4c type low porosity hair.  My hair is extremely prone to breakage.  This line has given me similar If not better results than anti breakage, bond repair products.  I used the shampoo, mask, leave in styling lotion and curl lotion.  At first use like I said, I noticed less hair in the drain and on my brush and comb.  I was able to use a comb in one pass without any knots or breakage.  My hair felt strong, smooth, moisturized, shiny and full.  I blow dried to stretch the hair and did a twist out.  my mom asked me if it was my real hair or if I had used crochet.  Thatu2019s how good it was!  I also got complemented by another person.  I was able to lay my hair without using any gel or edge control.  It looked natural and not greasy at all. It has a menty smell which is not overwhelming or overpowering at all.  It also disappears after a while.  It is pricey but you get so much product.  The only minor issue was that I had to use a lot of the shampoo to get it to foam and lather, but remember you only put it on your scalp not the hair shaft itself.  Overall the best line for natural hair I have ever used and I have been a natural for 7+ years so I have tried a lot of products.  I canu2019t wait to see the long term effect.  I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice conditioner. Not my favorite but works well. This is super thick. For medium length hair, 2-3 pumps needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: I have been searching for a great leave-in for a couple of years and this is by FAR my favorite for my 3a hair. It smells great and moisturizes really well without making my hair look dull or sticky like many other leave-ins do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This glorious leave-in works to detangle, hydrate, repair, strengthen, soften, define and bring a beautiful sheen to your curls for days!! A little goes a long way. My hair looks even better on the 2nd day of styling. And instead of using layers of products every day, this can be used on its own most days!! Makes wash and goes a breeze. If I want extra definition, I add the amazing Adwoa oil and/or a little gel. 100% would recommend & repurchase. Will be adding other pieces to my collection from this amazing brand.   Whoever boxed this at Sephora was incredibly careless to the point that I would avoid having a broken pump delivered to me. Likely will be buying certain Adwoa items in-store or going directly to the creatoru2019s site instead of enjoying free Rouge shipping.

reviews.review_title: exactly as it says, an awesome conditioning styler
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Softens hair super well, I have short thick hair and use it as a leave in conditioner/hair wax. It has the lightest hold if even any, but the conditioning properties are super awesome. Not the best smell but not gross by any means. What you get for the price is fantastic and it works like a super nourishing leave in conditioner with a smidge of soft buttery hold for curls.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is soft, but wow this stuff smells SO bad. It's like stale gingersnaps. I honestly don't know if I'll continue to use it because it's such a strong smell.

reviews.review_title: great leave in for very curly/ type 4 hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did my research and scouted reviews on various sites and YouTube. the deep conditioner seems to be the favorite but honestly, this is the standout product to be. it has great slip, very soft results and was able to finger detangle easily l.  im,not sure im,fond of the scent but im sure i can fix that with essential oils.  i would actually repurchase this as a leave in id reach for

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine wavy hair and this leaves my hair so soft and healthy feeling. I will definitely buy this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent product! Loving it! Moistures very well and makes it easy To comb my 4C kinky curly hair With no tangling. Please Adwoa, keep making your products, donu2019t stop!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! All the reviews are true! Made my hair incredibly soft and manageable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent product! The whole line is fire! My hair is soft, moisturized, and holds the style so we'll. Definitely a good investment!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works really well and moisturizes my 3c/4a hair really well.

reviews.review_title: What braid-out and twist-out curlies need!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I have tried and product that has given my high porosity hair moisture and definition for an entire week! I apply this one product to my hair and put my hair into braids. Then after a day or two, I unravel for a braid out and my hair stayed defined and moisturizer for 7 days! No reapplying, no other product. I enjoy the smell very much and application is smooth. Strongly recommend. Will repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Moisturizing and light hold great for dry hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I searched high and low for a leave in that leaves my hair moisturized for days.  This is it!  It leaves my hair soft and smelling good.  It has a sweet tropical minty smell that is not too strong.  Smooth consistency that works well with water.  It seems concentrated.  I have high porosity kinky (individual strands in front half are bumpy) curly hair that can get very dry.  I do the liquid/cream/oil (LCO) method on my hair.  Water, baomint leave in conditioner styler, and then the  baomint protect + shine oil blend.  Great for twist outs, braid outs, wash n go's, or just everyday moisture.  I need it in a liter size because my family of 4 all use it.  This product is excellent and we are a Adwoa Beauty house because of the quality of their products.  baomint moisturizing shampoo & baomint deep conditioning treatment round out our routines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing to write home about - lacks moisture and not the best detangler. Great packaging and scent but prefer a product that really works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I have been struggling to find something that moisturizes my 4c hair and this is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This right here leaves my hair soooo moisturized!!! My thick 4C low porosity hair loves this leave in !! I add it in the shower for extra power !! Loveeeee !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This leave-in conditioner is IT! I have low porosity 4c hair and this product provides moisture that lasts for daaaaays! Pair this with the curl defining cream and youu2019ll truly be wowed. I use those two products with an oil and Iu2019m set. Thank you Julian for creating products that are truly for us.

reviews.review_title: 3c hair. love it. less frizz more sheen moisture.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product: Great moisturing leave in for 3c hair. Tamed my frizz and has nice soft hold without the crunch. it also gives me a nice subtle sheen. ABOUT ME / ROUTINE:  I am mixed Black/Mexican.  I have an oilly scalp and the oil only stays at the top.  The rest of my hair is dry with frizz. Also thick which makes it hard for product to get in without heat.   After using this product for about 3 weeks I have had compliments on my curls. I think the prouduct alone works but I do the following: I use verb shampoo every other week for my ithcy oilly scalp( thats when I know I have build up). Followed by a deep conditioner. ( currently using camilla rose pink jar smells like mint). Then this styler and my favorite begoir oil. Other days when I wash regular I use brigeor quinoa  cowash every other day and this leavin every other 3 day as a refresher ( water then the product) and my bigeor oil or rose oil which ever I see first.  Note: I don't recommend using on dry hair it doesn't look good. wet hair works best. Good luck. I wanna try the deep conditioner when it comes back in stock ( picture shows it wet. )

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Turn on the restock notifications and snag it while itu2019s in stock! I happened to check the app the other day and it was it stock. I bought it that very second. It brings out my natural wave in ways no other product never has before. I love it. Iu2019ve never wrote a review on Sephora before but this is worth it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very strong not very pleasant smell. works well but feels heavy on Medium curly hair. Was hoping Iu2019d love it since I love the mint but I donu2019t:(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a black woman, Itu2019s really hard to find shampoos and leave in conditioner that donu2019t dry out mine or my sonu2019s hair. Iu2019m constantly trying out products. Baomint is great on our hair! Itu2019s not heavy on our hair and gives our curls especially mine some nice definition and moisture ( that the key)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Your curls will thank you for this amazing leave in conditioner. I've thrown out all my other products as it left my hair thirsty and dry. This conditioner gave my hair life and who knew hair could glow! Don't even think twice, add to cart ASAP.

reviews.review_title: BEST LEAVE IN ON THE MARKET
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't believe in leave in's until I used this. Literally cannot use anything else and it pairs well with everything. It's foamy when you apply wet and a little goes a long way. I literally use a dime size open each section of my hair when I part it into 4. I've used products with it and without it and it really makes a difference. I also use this on my baby's hair.

reviews.review_title: Where have you been all my life!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This leave-in is amazing! I use the entire line, I realized that I canu2019t live without this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my second favorite product of the whole line. Super moisturizing as a leave-in,  but it can also be your styler so you only need one product to work with! This product has hold! So if you are fine hair texture this is all you need. If you are coarser, this is a great primer underneath your styler.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just buy it your curls will thank you! I have 3c hair with a little 4a just for reference.

reviews.review_title: Best Leave in for Type 4/Low Porosity Hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this leave-in. My absolute favorite and I've been natural for over a decade now. It is super moisturizing and concentrated. It keeps my hair hydrated no matter the location: from a snowy Chicago to a humid/hot Lagos. Best I've used and I'm so glad this at Sephora now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This leave in is super moisturizing. I can use it by itself without having to add a cream or gel afterwards.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this leave in! It makes the hair soft like the rest of the products and leaves a beautiful shine.  I've heard it's potent enough to use as a styler, I haven't done that yet, but after using it as a leave-in I believe that is true.  Try it out, you won't regret it if you have kinky hair! Just buy the whole line, lol, I know they are kind of pricey but well worth it. I've been natural for over 12 years and these products have elevated my hair so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These products are amazing and my go to for my natural hair! I recommend these to anyone looking for a product that nourishes and brings life to your curls without leaving them feeling hard and heavy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I ABSOLUTELY love this product. First of all it smells amazing and its no moisturizing for my my 3c/4a curls.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I use it alone for braid outs on wet hair. My hair comes out defined and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite leave in conditioner. It is the creamiest most moisturizing leave in and pairs well with every cream or gel you layer on top.
Do yourself a favor and buy the leave in conditioner your hair will love you. This is the best leave in I have ever tried leaves hair soft and easy to detangle  I use the entire product line

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I freaking love this leave-in conditioner. Leaves my hair soft, manageable, and moisturized for days! Their whole line is awesome! I

reviews.review_title: HG statusss! one of my top 5 LI's
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have 4b/4c hair, low porosity, fine to med strands mostly and med to high density. I LOVEE this leave in! i apply it in the shower after rinsing my DC (the adwoa DC or any one DC). it leaves my low porosity, HARD to moisturize hair supple, moisturized, manageable and set me up for an amazing, moisturized style. this is an HG product and worth every dime. it is something dependable that delivers consistent results and i know i can always reach for if my hair needs that extra love

reviews.review_title: HEAR ME OUT - $$ is worth IT!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I RIDE OR DIE FOR THIS LEAVE-IN!! Listen - I first went natural in 2017 and had enough heat damaged that I was rocking ponytails and buns for a while. Then I took the leap and did a mini-chop/DevaCut before heading back to college.  THIS PRODUCT SAVED MY HAIR!! I had no idea what I was doing with my curls (4A-B, low porosity) and was prone to waiting till the last minute for wash-day. This product made my life so much easier and it smells AMAZING! You do need to follow the directions for this product since the ingredients work best with a good amount of water! But I bought the whole line then and will continue to use the leave-in until they don't sell it anymore (which I hope they never do). It's my holy grail leave-in - Every once in a while I'll go back to TGIN using TGIN or something else but this one always holds me down. TOTALLY WORTH IT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally question the need for leave-ins. On it's on, it does multiple things from refreshing, curling and hydrating and much more. This is like the natural, clean and kinky version of head and shoulder cause it does everything and then some. My hair loves LOVES this leave-in and sometimes this is all I use the just put it in a puff and go. Def makes my wash days soooo simple and short.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair
reviews.review_text: No other leave in compares. If you use the entire line, WOW! Even alone, this leave in does the job of leaving my hair soft, easily manageable and with great shine. I have used Adwoa for years, and nothing compares!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This leave in conditioner is the best ever.  My hair feels so soft and moist.  Best I ever used.  So glad to see itu2019s now at Sephora for easy pick up.

reviews.review_title: Reformed product junky.This is all I need.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best! Thick leave in that gives moisture for days. I have type 3 & 4 hair with mix of low and normal porosity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this leave in, This provides excellent moisture, my hair is at its best since I found this leave in. This is a staple for me. So glad I can now purchase in Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This leave in is conveniently package and and super attractive! It works just as good as it looks! I use it following the deep conditioner as well as when Iu2019m refreshing my hair. Itu2019s absorbs within each strand and provides slip so that my fingers and detangling brush glides gently and unopposed. I have 4b/c hair and this leave in along with the rest of adwoa beauty products are stables on my hair routine! I discovered this product line in fall 2019 and have not strayed away since! I love these products and look forward to maintaining healthy hair while using these products!

reviews.review_title: u201cMust have Leave inu201d- Low Porosity 4C queen
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought it prior to Sephora online move. Bought as a recommendation from youtuber. It is not too thick for my hair and smells great and is high quality. Some days, especially quarantine days, it is the only product I use and it keeps my hair moisturized for days. So, it could be considered a one-step product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: This leave in conditioner is excellent. It's thick. It's creamy. Combined with the adwoa twisting cream and the adwoa oil, my hair looks shiny and moisturized for far longer than any other natural hair line I've tried. It's worth the money.    My twist outs stay defined for longer, too. Perhaps the only downside to this is that I get less volume (I like volume) in the first few days. However, longer definition leads to styles that last longer, which means that I am spending fewer hours on my hair. Time saved>volume in this case.   Con: The smell isn't powerful, but because winter green has never been a favorite smell, I don't like the scent. But, the smell fades fast. Plus, you get used to it after using the products week after week because the smell is not strong. In this case, the product's results outweigh the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Truly leaves hair feeling moisturized. I have not yet found a better leave-in that u201cleavesu201d my wash-n-go looking hydrated, and feeling soft. Awesome product! I have bought it several times!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this conditioner makes my hair feel soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect leave in. Itu2019s moisturizing and doesnu2019t leave residue. Itu2019s a great place to start for your twist outs and wash and go using their gel. Itu2019s a natural hair must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair
reviews.review_text: This is one of the BEST Leave In Conditioning Stylers Iu2019ve ever used! It gives my hair instant moisture! It makes my hair super soft! Also, I use it to detangle my hair. Itu2019s like a Multi-Use product for me, leave in, moisturizer, and detangler! Oh, I almost forgot, the smell is amazing! Itu2019s like a Spa (Hair Soa)  anytime I use this line of products because the smell is so good! Inhale, exhale, youu2019re in for a treat using this line of products! The pump to dispense it is a great addition as well!

reviews.review_title: ADWOA BEAUTY - FINALLY, THE SECRET IS OUT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a coup! Sephora snagged the best beauty product line. I have been using it from the beginning. The entire line. So happy to have an option to purchase when I am traveling. My 4c hair has never been this happy. It is a must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so excited to see Adwoa Beauty in Sephora. These products are my holy grail products and my hair won't act right without them. The leave-in is specifically special, it leaves my coily/kinky hair moisturized for over a week and keeps my styles intact - sometimes I don't even want to wash my style out because it still looks so good!
